note:
Meet Oscar is a specialist recruitment-to-recruitment consultancy based in the heart of Shoreditch.
We source world-class recruitment talent and introduce them to some of the most dynamic and
disruptive recruitment brands in the industry. We distinguish ourselves through our knowledgable,
non-transactional and refreshingly honest service to our client and candidate base. To know more
about us call 0203 488 0427 or explore the website. Visit - https://www.meetoscar.co.uk
